tool_description: Access to the largest database of medicines and healthcare products.
title: myHealthbox

api_list.name: Product Documents
api_list.description: Get a list of documents associated to a specific product

headers.access-control-allow-headers: Origin, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, X-Sid, X-Token, X-Email

parameters.name: nman_code
parameters.description: This value is returned by a product/info call (i.e. nman_code)

api_list.name: Product Info
api_list.description: Get all available information about a specific product

result.name: Abilify
result.therapeutic_indication: Abilify is indicated for the treatment of schizophrenia in adults and in adolescents aged 15 years and older., Abilify is indicated for the treatment of moderate to severe manic episodes in Bipolar I Disorder and for the prevention of a new manic episode in adults who experienced predominantly manic episodes and whose manic episodes responded to aripiprazole treatment., Abilify is indicated for the treatment up to 12 weeks of moderate to severe manic episodes in Bipolar I Disorder in adolescents aged 13 years and older.,

headers.access-control-allow-headers: Origin, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, X-Sid, X-Token, X-Email

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: This value is returned by a call to search/fulltext  (i.e. product_id)

api_list.name: Get document Url
api_list.description: Get the URL of a document, the URL is valid for 24 hours.

headers.access-control-allow-headers: Origin, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, X-Sid, X-Token, X-Email

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: This value is returned by an product/documents call

api_list.name: Updated Documents
api_list.description: Search documents that have been updated after a certain date or within a date interval

result.mah: Denton Pharma, Inc. DBA Northwind Pharmaceuticals
Denton Pharma, Inc. DBA Northwind Pharmaceuticals

result.commercial_name: KETOROLAC TROMETHAMINE- ketorolac tromethamine injection, solution
DULOXETINE DELAYED-RELEASE- duloxetine hydrochloride capsule, delayed release pellets
CIPROFLOXACIN- ciprofloxacin hydrochloride tablet, film coated

headers.access-control-allow-headers: Origin, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, X-Sid, X-Token, X-Email

parameters.name: t
parameters.description:
Document type, one of:  
pil (Patient Information Leaflet), spc (Summary of Product Characteristics), par (Public Assessment Report), sds (Safety Data Sheet), man (User Manual), inf (Product Information), mmr (Additional Risk Minimisation Measures), hta (Health Technology Assessment Report)

constraints.inter-dependency: sd, ed: if sd is provided, ed can be provided to specify a date interval.

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: See the Supported countries section in the Developers Manual

parameters.name: f
parameters.description: Field optional parameter, if present it can only have 1 value. Perform date comparison on this attribute (date when record was updated in the myHealthbox database) instead of the default one (date when the actual document was updated).

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: See the Supported countries section in the Developers Manual.

api_list.name: Alerts Search
api_list.description: Search alerts (health alerts, products recalls, etc.) in over 60 countries. Information is only from official sources (health Ministries and Government Agencies).

result.source: FDA - U.S. Food and Drug Administration
result.title: Recommended Statement for Over-the-Counter Aspirin-Containing Drug Products Labeled With Cardiovascular Related Imagery Guidance for Industry

result.description: The FDA Drug Safety Podcasts provide emerging safety information about drugs in conjunction with the release of Public Health Advisories. - FDA Drug Safety Podcast: FDA warns about serious bleeding risk with over-the-counter antacid products containing aspirin
result.source: FDA - U.S. Food and Drug Administration
result.title: FDA Drug Safety Podcast - FDA Drug Safety Podcast: FDA warns about serious bleeding risk with over-the-counter antacid products containing aspirin

result.description: Information on using aspirin daily,  over-the-counter, with other medicines, as well as its side effects
result.source: FDA - U.S. Food and Drug Administration
result.title: Aspirin for Reducing Your Risk of Heart Attack and Stroke: Know the Facts

headers.access-control-allow-headers: Origin, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, X-Sid, X-Token, X-Email

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Any string or set of strings

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: See the manual for a full list of supported countries and codes.

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: See the manual for a full list of supported languages and codes.

api_list.name: Fulltext Search
api_list.description: Fulltext search against the whole database of products (default search is on all fields and documents)

result.mah: NCS HealthCare of KY, Inc dba Vangard Labs
result.name: ASPIRIN

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Any string or set of strings

parameters.name: f
parameters.description: Only one of the following values can be used: name, active_ingredient, barcode, atc_code.
